title: Fox Widescreen Font
content:
Can anyone help me identify this? I've been looking for a while   
   
Thanks :D ![fox_widescreen](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908090526im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70611.jpg)
author: remixed05

comments.content: Looks a bit like T26's [Phuture](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908090526/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/phuture-odc/) stretched out.

Different X and N but [Xenotron](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908090526/http:/home.luna.nl/~xino/fonts/xenotron/index.html) is very [close](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908090526/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=xenotron&page=&nb_ppp_old=10&text=FOWIDESC&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha).
